## Validation Checklist

<!-- Before submitting, verify the following -->

- [ ] All folder names referenced in docs exist (no typos)
- [ ] All links in README/docs are valid
- [ ] Heading levels are consistent (only one `#` at top, others `##`/`###`)
- [ ] No references to non-existent files
- [ ] Build/tests run successfully (for code changes)
- [ ] For database migrations: SQL syntax is valid, migration is idempotent, migration number follows sequence
- [ ] For structure changes: AI tools can still navigate correctly
